summary: This document is an email from Larry Mikell, Manager of the PCS Trader team at TD Ameritrade, welcoming Southern Financial LLC to the Private Client Services Trader program. It outlines the benefits of the program and provides information about the team members who will assist them, including their backgrounds and expertise in trading.

persons.name: Larry Mikell
persons.context: Larry Mikell introduces the PCS Trader program and outlines its benefits to Southern Financial LLC.

persons.name: Brad Judd
persons.context: Brad Judd is mentioned as part of the PCS Trader team with extensive experience in trading futures options.

persons.name: Micah Riskin
persons.context: Micah Riskin is highlighted for his expertise in complex trading strategies and his role on the Trade Desk.

persons.name: Michael Palermo
persons.context: Michael Palermo is noted for his experience as an options market maker and his role in supporting active trader clients.

persons.name: Travis Game
persons.context: Travis Game is mentioned for his management of the Trade Desk team and expertise in advanced options.

persons.name: Stubhy Pandav
persons.context: Stubhy Pandav is recognized for his performance in servicing investment advisors on the Institutional platform.

persons.name: Chad Wilber
persons.context: Chad Wilber is mentioned as a contact for the PCS Trader program and provides his contact information.

persons.name: Richard (Bart) Leake
persons.context: Richard (Bart) Leake is noted for his extensive experience in options trading and his recent transition to TD Ameritrade.

persons.name: Joseph Carava
persons.context: Joseph Carava is mentioned for his background in trading and his role in executing strategies for institutional clients.

persons.name: Alex Coffey
persons.context: Alex Coffey is highlighted for his expertise in TD Ameritrade's accounts-related procedures.

persons.name: Will Bolton
persons.context: Will Bolton is mentioned for his expertise in advanced derivatives and his role in the Futures and Forex Trade Desk.

locations: 600 West Chicago Avenue, Suite #100, Chicago, IL 60654-2597
keyFacts: The email welcomes Southern Financial LLC to the Private Client Services Trader program.
Larry Mikell outlines the benefits of the PCS Trader program, including priority access and risk management.
The email includes a list of team members with their backgrounds and expertise in trading.
The document emphasizes the team's commitment to providing specialized services to active trader clients.
Contact information for Chad Wilber is provided for further assistance.
